alert.note: Alert for Breckinridge; Meade (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued July 08 at 6:38PM EDT by NWS Louisville
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 945 PM EDT/845 PM CDT/ THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...Portions of south central Indiana and NORTH CENTRAL Kentucky, including the following counties, in south central Indiana, Harrison IN and Perry. In NORTH CENTRAL Kentucky, Breckinridge and Meade. * WHEN...Until 945 PM EDT /845 PM CDT/. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 638 PM EDT /538 PM CDT/, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. Minor flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly in the advisory area. Between 1 and 2 inches of rain have fallen. - Additional rainfall amounts up to 0.5 inches are expected over the area. This additional rain will result in minor flooding. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Brandenburg, Mauckport, New Amsterdam, Payneville, Lodale, Battletown, Sirocco, Andyville, Titus and Raymond. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
